<title level="1" right="Hazard 2" pfs="">[Spear Launcher](/Hazards.aspx?ID=483)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A wall socket loaded with a spear connects to a floor tile in one 5-foot square.

---

**Stealth**
DC 20 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 18 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) (trained) on the floor tile or wall socket

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 18, **Fort** +11, **Ref** +3

**Hardness**
8

**HP**
32 (BT 16)

**Immunities**
[critical hits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2190), [object immunities](/Rules.aspx?ID=2161), precision damage

</column>

**Spear** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** Pressure is applied to the floor tile; **Effect** The trap shoots a spear, making a [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) against the creature or object on the floor tile.

**Ranged** spear +14, **Damage** 2d6+6 piercing
